1191,177|1171,197|1151,217|1131,218|1111,198|1091,218|991,218|971,219|871,219|851,199|839,187|822,188|811,200|791,220|751,220|731,200|691,200|671,220|651,221|591,221|571,202|551,200|531,182|511,178|451,178|431,180|411,184|398,187|337,223|300,204|286,203|211,203|205,197|187,196|185,197|171,234|171,258|209,268|271,268|291,270|311,272|331,274|351,274|371,280|391,276|451,276|471,274|491,274|511,276|531,280|551,280|571,276|591,272|611,282|631,282|651,270|671,264|691,272|711,274|731,270|751,272|771,272|791,274|831,274|851,278|871,278|891,274|911,270|971,270|991,274|1011,274|1031,276|1091,276|1111,268|1131,268|1151,270|1171,270|1191,272|1271,272|1291,268|1311,268|1331,270|1451,270|1471,266|1491,262|1531,262|1551,264|1571,264|1591,266|1671,266|1691,264|1951,264|1971,266|1991,266|2010,260|1999,212|1951,212|1931,213|1871,213|1851,193|1811,193|1791,213|1771,194|1751,194|1731,214|1691,214|1671,194|1651,214|1631,214|1611,215|1551,215|1534,181|1506,180|1491,195|1471,195|1451,196|1411,196|1391,216|1351,216|1331,196|1311,196|1291,217|1271,177 274-01|274.|Letters,|Orders|and|Instructions.|October|1755.
